best_gem_comment: Take this class, a gem! It is not very demanding and Gutierrez is such a supportive and knowledgeable professor. It was really fun to dedicate time during the week to speak in Spanish.

I would highly recommend that you take this class. Dr. Brisson is an absolute gem, the sweetest lady, and very understanding and flexible if you need extensions on homework, projects, etc. The course load is not bad at all, and the final project (where you create a short French film in groups) is relatively low–pressure and super fun and creative. You’ll learn loads about Francophone cinema from a range of really interesting movies, which is not only a fun homework but also teaches you so much about Francophone culture – it’s really interesting. Definitely take this class – it was my favourite class this semester and you won’t regret it.
best_gem_comment_short: Dr. Brisson is an absolute gem, the sweetest lady, and very understanding and flexible if you need extensions on homework, projects, etc.

best_gem_comment: If you really want to take French I think this course is great, but it's also really dependent on your TF so it's not necessarily and guaranteed gem.
best_gem_comment_short: If you really want to take French I think this course is great, but it's also really dependent on your TF so it's not necessarily and guaranteed gem.
